q-date/navigation-max-year-month.description: Lock user from navigating above a specific year+month (in YYYY/MM format); This prop is not used to correct the model; You might want to also use 'default-year-month' prop

q-dialog/no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss Dialog; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

q-dialog/auto-close.description: Any click/tap inside of the dialog will close it

q-dialog/seamless.description: Put Dialog into seamless mode; Does not use a backdrop so user is able to interact with the rest of the page too

q-dialog/full-width.description: Dialog will try to render with same width as the window

q-dialog/full-height.description: Dialog will try to render with same height as the window

q-dialog/position.description: Stick dialog to one of the sides (top, right, bottom or left)

q-dialog/square.description: Forces content to have squared borders

q-dialog/no-refocus.description: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus

q-dialog/no-focus.description: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets shown, do not switch focus on it

q-dialog/no-shake.description: Do not shake up the Dialog to catch user's attention

q-dialog/allow-focus-outside.description: Allow elements outside of the Dialog to be focusable; By default, for accessibility reasons, QDialog does not allow outer focus

q-drawer/model-value.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-drawer/overlay.description: Puts drawer into overlay mode (does not occupy space on screen, narrowing the page)

q-drawer/mini-width.description: Width of drawer (in pixels) when in mini mode

q-drawer/mini-to-overlay.description: Mini mode will expand as an overlay

q-drawer/no-mini-animation.description: Disables animation of the drawer when toggling mini mode

q-drawer/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-drawer/breakpoint.description: Breakpoint (in pixels) of layout width up to which mobile mode is used

q-drawer/behavior.description: Overrides the default dynamic mode into which the drawer is put on

q-drawer/bordered.description: Applies a default border to the component

q-drawer/elevated.description: Adds a default shadow to the header

q-drawer/persistent.description: Prevents drawer from auto-closing when app's route changes

q-drawer/show-if-above.description: Forces drawer to be shown on screen on initial render if the layout width is above breakpoint, regardless of v-model; This is the default behavior when SSR is taken over by client on initial render

q-drawer/no-swipe-open.description: Disables the default behavior where drawer can be swiped into view; Useful for iOS platforms where it might interfere with Safari's 'swipe to go to previous/next page' feature

q-drawer/no-swipe-close.description: Disables the default behavior where drawer can be swiped out of view (applies to drawer content only); Useful for iOS platforms where it might interfere with Safari's 'swipe to go to previous/next page' feature

q-drawer/no-swipe-backdrop.description: Disables the default behavior where drawer backdrop can be swiped

q-editor/no-route-fullscreen-exit.description: Changing route app won't exit fullscreen

q-editor/model-value.description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

q-editor/square.description: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

q-editor/dense.description: Dense mode; toolbar buttons are shown on one-line only

q-editor/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-editor/min-height.description: CSS unit for the minimum height of the editable area

q-editor/max-height.description: CSS unit for maximum height of the input area

q-editor/height.description: CSS value to set the height of the editable area

q-editor/definitions.description: Definition of commands and their buttons to be included in the 'toolbar' prop

q-editor/toolbar.description: An array of arrays of Objects/Strings that you use to define the construction of the elements and commands available in the toolbar

q-editor/toolbar-color.description: Font color (from the Quasar Palette) of buttons and text in the toolbar

q-editor/toolbar-text-color.description: Text color (from the Quasar Palette) of toolbar commands

q-editor/toolbar-toggle-color.description: Choose the active color (from the Quasar Palette) of toolbar commands button

q-editor/toolbar-push.description: Toolbar buttons are rendered as a "push-button" type

q-editor/content-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QEditor

q-editor/content-class.description: CSS classes for the input area

q-expansion-item/to.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-expansion-item/exact.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'exact' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-expansion-item/replace.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-expansion-item/active-class.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-expansion-item/exact-active-class.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-expansion-item/href.description: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

q-expansion-item/target.description: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only along with 'href' prop; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

q-expansion-item/model-value.description: Model of the component defining 'open' state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

q-expansion-item/icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-expansion-item/expand-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-expansion-item/expanded-icon.description: Expand icon name (following Quasar convention) for when QExpansionItem is expanded; When used, it also disables the rotation animation of the expand icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

q-expansion-item/expand-icon-class.description: Apply custom class(es) to the expand icon item section

q-expansion-item/toggle-aria-label.description: aria-label to be used on the expansion toggle element

q-expansion-item/label-lines.description: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!

q-expansion-item/caption-lines.description: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!

q-expansion-item/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-expansion-item/header-inset-level.description: Apply an inset to header (unless using 'header' slot); Useful when header avatar/left side is missing but you want to align content with other items that do have a left side, or when you're building a menu

q-expansion-item/content-inset-level.description: Apply an inset to content (changes content padding)

q-expansion-item/expand-separator.description: Apply a top and bottom separator when expansion item is opened

q-expansion-item/default-opened.description: Puts expansion item into open state on initial render; Overridden by v-model if used

q-expansion-item/hide-expand-icon.description: Do not show the expand icon

q-expansion-item/expand-icon-toggle.description: Applies the expansion events to the expand icon only and not to the whole header

q-expansion-item/switch-toggle-side.description: Switch expand icon side (from default 'right' to 'left')

q-expansion-item/dense-toggle.description: Use dense mode for expand icon

q-expansion-item/group.description: Register expansion item into a group (unique name that must be applied to all expansion items in that group) for coordinated open/close state within the group a.k.a. 'accordion mode'

q-expansion-item/header-style.description: Apply custom style to the header

q-expansion-item/header-class.description: Apply custom class(es) to the header

q-fab/type.description: Define the button HTML DOM type

q-fab/padding.description: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set

q-fab/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-fab/text-color.description: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

q-fab/glossy.description: Apply the glossy effect over the button

q-fab/external-label.description: Display label besides the FABs, as external content

q-fab/label.description: The label that will be shown when Fab is extended

q-fab/label-position.description: Position of the label around the icon

q-fab/hide-label.description: Hide the label; Useful for animation purposes where you toggle the visibility of the label

q-fab/label-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the label container

q-fab/label-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the label container

q-fab/square.description: Apply a rectangle aspect to the FAB

q-fab/model-value.description: Controls state of fab actions (showing/hidden); Works best with v-model directive, otherwise use along listening to 'update:modelValue' event

q-fab/icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-fab/active-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-fab/direction.description: Direction to expand Fab Actions to

q-fab/vertical-actions-align.description: The side of the Fab where Fab Actions will expand (only when direction is 'up' or 'down')

q-fab/persistent.description: By default, Fab Actions are hidden when user navigates to another route and this prop disables this behavior

q-fab-action/type.description: Define the button HTML DOM type

q-fab-action/padding.description: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set

q-fab-action/hide-label.description: Hide the label; Useful for animation purposes where you toggle the visibility of the label

q-fab-action/label-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the label container

q-fab-action/square.description: Apply a rectangle aspect to the FAB

q-fab-action/anchor.description: How to align the Fab Action relative to Fab expand side; By default it uses the align specified in QFab

q-field/model-value.description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-field/error-message.description: Validation error message (gets displayed only if 'error' is set to 'true')

q-field/no-error-icon.description: Hide error icon when there is an error

q-field/rules.description: Array of Functions/Strings; If String, then it must be a name of one of the embedded validation rules

q-field/reactive-rules.description: By default a change in the rules does not trigger a new validation until the model changes; If set to true then a change in the rules will trigger a validation; Has a performance penalty, so use it only when you really need it

q-field/lazy-rules.description: If set to boolean true then it checks validation status against the 'rules' only after field loses focus for first time; If set to 'ondemand' then it will trigger only when component's validate() method is manually called or when the wrapper QForm submits itself

q-field/label.description: A text label that will â€œfloatâ€ up above the input field, once the field gets focus

q-field/stack-label.description: Label will be always shown above the field regardless of field content (if any)

q-field/hint.description: Helper (hint) text which gets placed below your wrapped form component

q-field/hide-hint.description: Hide the helper (hint) text when field doesn't have focus

q-field/label-color.description: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused

q-field/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-field/bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-field/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-field/loading.description: Signals the user a process is in progress by displaying a spinner; Spinner can be customized by using the 'loading' slot.

q-field/clearable.description: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null

q-field/clear-icon.description: Custom icon to use for the clear button when using along with 'clearable' prop

q-field/standout.description: Use 'standout' design for the field; Specifies classes to be applied when focused (overriding default ones)

q-field/label-slot.description: Enables label slot; You need to set it to force use of the 'label' slot if the 'label' prop is not set

q-field/hide-bottom-space.description: Do not reserve space for hint/error/counter anymore when these are not used; As a result, it also disables the animation for those; It also allows the hint/error area to stretch vertically based on its content

q-field/counter.description: Show an automatic counter on bottom right

q-field/rounded.description: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component

q-field/square.description: Remove border-radius so borders are squared; Overrides 'rounded' prop

q-field/item-aligned.description: Match inner content alignment to that of QItem

q-field/autofocus.description: Focus field on initial component render

q-field/for.description: Used to specify the 'id' of the control and also the 'for' attribute of the label that wraps it; If no 'name' prop is specified, then it is used for this attribute as well

q-field/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms; If not specified, it takes the value of 'for' prop, if it exists

q-field/maxlength.description: Specify a max length of model

q-file/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms; If not specified, it takes the value of 'for' prop, if it exists

q-file/accept.description: Comma separated list of unique file type specifiers. Maps to 'accept' attribute of native input type=file element

q-file/capture.description: Optionally, specify that a new file should be captured, and which device should be used to capture that new media of a type defined by the 'accept' prop. Maps to 'capture' attribute of native input type=file element

q-file/max-total-size.description: Maximum size of all files combined in bytes

q-file/max-files.description: Maximum number of files to contain

q-file/filter.description: Custom filter for added files; Only files that pass this filter will be added to the queue and uploaded; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-icon/left.description: Useful if icon is on the left side of something: applies a standard margin on the right side of Icon

q-icon/right.description: Useful if icon is on the right side of something: applies a standard margin on the left side of Icon

q-img/ratio.description: Force the component to maintain an aspect ratio

q-img/placeholder-src.description: While waiting for your image to load, you can use a placeholder image

q-img/initial-ratio.description: Use it when not specifying 'ratio' but still wanting an initial aspect ratio

q-img/width.description: Forces image width; Must also include the unit (px or %)

q-img/height.description: Forces image height; Must also include the unit (px or %)

q-img/loading.description: Lazy or immediate load; Same syntax as loading attribute

q-img/fetchpriority.description: Provides a hint of the relative priority to use when fetching the image

q-img/fit.description: How the image will fit into the container; Equivalent of the object-fit prop; Can be coordinated with 'position' prop

q-img/position.description: The alignment of the image into the container; Equivalent of the object-position CSS prop

q-img/img-class.description: CSS classes to be attributed to the native img element

q-input/input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the underlying input tag

q-intersection/ssr-prerender.description: Pre-render content on server side if using SSR (use it to pre-render above the fold content)

q-intersection/root.description: [Intersection API root prop] Lets you define an alternative to the viewport as your root (through its DOM element); It is important to keep in mind that root needs to be an ancestor of the observed element

q-intersection/margin.description: [Intersection API rootMargin prop] Allows you to specify the margins for the root, effectively allowing you to either grow or shrink the area used for intersections

q-intersection/threshold.description: [Intersection API threshold prop] Threshold(s) at which to trigger, specified as a ratio, or list of ratios, of (visible area / total area) of the observed element

q-intersection/disable.description: Disable visibility observable (content will remain as it was, visible or hidden)

q-item/to.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-item/exact.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'exact' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-item/replace.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-item/active-class.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-item/exact-active-class.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

q-item/href.description: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

q-item/target.description: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only along with 'href' prop; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

q-item/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-item/clickable.description: Is QItem clickable? If it's the case, then it will add hover effects and emit 'click' events

q-item/inset-level.description: Apply an inset; Useful when avatar/left side is missing but you want to align content with other items that do have a left side, or when you're building a menu

q-item/tag.description: HTML tag to render; Suggestion: use 'label' when encapsulating a QCheckbox/QRadio/QToggle so that when user clicks/taps on the whole item it will trigger a model change for the mentioned components

q-item/manual-focus.description: Put item into a manual focus state; Enables 'focused' prop which will determine if item is focused or not, rather than relying on native hover/focus states

q-item/focused.description: Determines focus state, ONLY if 'manual-focus' is enabled / set to true

q-item-label/lines.description: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines;

q-item-section/avatar.description: Render an avatar item side (does not needs 'side' prop to be set)

q-item-section/thumbnail.description: Render a thumbnail item side (does not needs 'side' prop to be set)

q-item-section/side.description: Renders as a side of the item

q-item-section/top.description: Align content to top (useful for multi-line items)

q-item-section/no-wrap.description: Do not wrap text (useful for item's main content)

q-list/bordered.description: Applies a default border to the component

q-list/separator.description: Applies a separator between contained items

q-list/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-list/padding.description: Applies a material design-like padding on top and bottom

q-knob/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

q-knob/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-knob/model-value.description: Any number to indicate the given value of the knob. Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use the v-model directive

q-knob/min.description: The minimum value that the model (the knob value) should start at

q-knob/max.description: The maximum value that the model (the knob value) should go to

q-knob/inner-min.description: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

q-knob/inner-max.description: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

q-knob/step.description: A number representing steps in the value of the model, while adjusting the knob

q-knob/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-knob/center-color.description: Color name for the center part of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-knob/track-color.description: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-knob/font-size.description: Size of text in CSS units, including unit name. Suggestion: use 'em' units to sync with component size

q-knob/thickness.description: Thickness of progress arc as a ratio (0.0 < x < 1.0) of component size

q-knob/angle.description: Angle to rotate progress arc by

q-knob/show-value.description: Enables the default slot and uses it (if available), otherwise it displays the 'value' prop as text; Make sure the text has enough space to be displayed inside the component

q-layout/view.description: Defines how your layout components (header/footer/drawer) should be placed on screen; See docs examples

q-layout/container.description: Containerize the layout which means it changes the default behavior of expanding to the whole window; Useful (but not limited to) for when using on a QDialog

q-linear-progress/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-linear-progress/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-linear-progress/track-color.description: Color name for component's track from the Quasar Color Palette

q-linear-progress/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-linear-progress/stripe.description: Draw stripes; For determinate state only (for performance reasons)

q-linear-progress/rounded.description: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component

q-markup-table/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-markup-table/bordered.description: Applies a default border to the component

q-markup-table/square.description: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

q-markup-table/separator.description: Use a separator/border between rows, columns or all cells

q-menu/target.description: Configure a target element to trigger component toggle; 'true' means it enables the parent DOM element, 'false' means it disables attaching events to any DOM elements; By using a String (CSS selector) or a DOM element it attaches the events to the specified DOM element (if it exists)

q-menu/no-parent-event.description: Skips attaching events to the target DOM element (that trigger the element to get shown)

q-menu/context-menu.description: Allows the component to behave like a context menu, which opens with a right mouse click (or long tap on mobile)

q-menu/model-value.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-menu/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-menu/fit.description: Allows the menu to match at least the full width of its target

q-menu/cover.description: Allows the menu to cover its target. When used, the 'self' and 'fit' props are no longer effective

q-menu/anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target

q-menu/self.description: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target

q-menu/offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels

q-menu/scroll-target.description: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as a custom scroll container instead of the auto detected one

q-menu/touch-position.description: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when the target of the menu is either clicked or touched

q-menu/persistent.description: Allows the menu to not be dismissed by a click/tap outside of the menu or by hitting the ESC key

q-menu/no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss the popup; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

q-menu/auto-close.description: Allows any click/tap in the menu to close it; Useful instead of attaching events to each menu item that should close the menu on click/tap

q-menu/separate-close-popup.description: Separate from parent menu, marking it as a separate closing point for v-close-popup (without this, chained menus close all together)

q-menu/square.description: Forces content to have squared borders

q-menu/no-refocus.description: (Accessibility) When Menu gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus

q-menu/no-focus.description: (Accessibility) When Menu gets shown, do not switch focus on it

q-menu/max-height.description: The maximum height of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

q-menu/max-width.description: The maximum width of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

q-no-ssr/placeholder.description: Text to display on server-side render (unless using 'placeholder' slot)

q-option-group/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-option-group/model-value.description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-option-group/options.description: Array of objects with value, label, and disable (optional) props. The binary components will be created according to this array; Props from QToggle, QCheckbox or QRadio can also be added as key/value pairs to control the components singularly

q-option-group/name.description: Used to specify the name of the controls; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

q-option-group/type.description: The type of input component to be used

q-option-group/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-option-group/keep-color.description: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when input components are unticked?

q-option-group/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-option-group/left-label.description: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the input components

q-option-group/inline.description: Show input components as inline-block rather than each having their own row

q-page/padding.description: Applies a default responsive page padding

q-page/style-fn.description: Override default CSS style applied to the component (sets minHeight); Function(offset: Number) => CSS props/value: Object; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-page-scroller/offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the component horizontally and vertically in pixels

q-page-scroller/expand.description: By default the component shrinks to content's size; By using this prop you make the component fully expand horizontally or vertically, based on 'position' prop

q-page-scroller/scroll-offset.description: Scroll offset (in pixels) from which point the component is shown on page; Measured from the top of the page (or from the bottom if in 'reverse' mode)

q-page-scroller/reverse.description: Work in reverse (shows when scrolling to the top of the page and scrolls to bottom when triggered)

q-page-scroller/duration.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the scrolling until it reaches its target

q-page-sticky/offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the component horizontally and vertically in pixels

q-page-sticky/expand.description: By default the component shrinks to content's size; By using this prop you make the component fully expand horizontally or vertically, based on 'position' prop

q-pagination/max.description: Number of last page (must be higher than 'min')

q-pagination/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color (useful when you are using it along with the 'input' prop)

q-pagination/size.description: Button size in CSS units, including unit name

q-pagination/input.description: Use an input instead of buttons

q-pagination/icon-prev.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-pagination/icon-next.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-pagination/icon-first.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-pagination/icon-last.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-pagination/to-fn.description: Generate link for page buttons; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-pagination/boundary-numbers.description: Always show first and last page buttons (if not using 'input')

q-pagination/ellipses.description: Show ellipses (...) when pages are available

q-pagination/max-pages.description: Maximum number of page links to display at a time; 0 means Infinite

q-pagination/flat.description: Use 'flat' design for non-active buttons (it's the default option)

q-pagination/color.description: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the non-active buttons

q-pagination/text-color.description: Text color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE buttons

q-pagination/active-design.description: The design of the ACTIVE button, similar to the flat/outline/push/unelevated props (but those are used for non-active buttons)

q-pagination/active-color.description: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

q-pagination/active-text-color.description: Text color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

q-pagination/round.description: Makes a circle shaped button for all buttons

q-pagination/rounded.description: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button for all buttons

q-pagination/glossy.description: Applies a glossy effect for all buttons

q-pagination/gutter.description: Apply custom gutter; Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-pagination/padding.description: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set

q-pagination/input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the input (if using one)

q-pagination/input-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the input (if using one)

q-pagination/ripple.description: Configure buttons material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object); Does not applies to boundary and ellipsis buttons

q-parallax/src.description: Path to image (unless a 'media' slot is used)

q-parallax/scroll-target.description: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as a custom scroll container instead of the auto detected one

q-popup-edit/model-value.description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-popup-edit/auto-save.description: Automatically save the model (if changed) when user clicks/taps outside of the popup; It does not apply to ESC key

q-popup-edit/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-popup-edit/validate.description: Validates model then triggers 'save' and closes Popup; Returns a Boolean ('true' means valid, 'false' means abort); Syntax: validate(value); For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-popup-edit/fit.description: Allows the menu to match at least the full width of its target

q-popup-edit/cover.description: Allows the menu to cover its target. When used, the 'self' and 'fit' props are no longer effective

q-popup-edit/anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target

q-popup-edit/self.description: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target

q-popup-edit/offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels

q-popup-edit/touch-position.description: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when the target of the menu is either clicked or touched

q-popup-edit/persistent.description: Avoid menu closing by hitting ESC key or by clicking/tapping outside of the Popup

q-popup-edit/separate-close-popup.description: Separate from parent menu, marking it as a separate closing point for v-close-popup (without this, chained menus close all together)

q-popup-edit/square.description: Forces menu to have squared borders

q-popup-edit/max-height.description: The maximum height of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

q-popup-edit/max-width.description: The maximum width of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

q-popup-proxy/target.description: Configure a target element to trigger component toggle; 'true' means it enables the parent DOM element, 'false' means it disables attaching events to any DOM elements; By using a String (CSS selector) or a DOM element it attaches the events to the specified DOM element (if it exists)

q-popup-proxy/no-parent-event.description: Skips attaching events to the target DOM element (that trigger the element to get shown)

q-popup-proxy/context-menu.description: Allows the component to behave like a context menu, which opens with a right mouse click (or long tap on mobile)

q-popup-proxy/model-value.description: Defines the state of the component (shown/hidden); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

q-popup-proxy/breakpoint.description: Breakpoint (in pixels) of window width/height (whichever is smaller) from where a Menu will get to be used instead of a Dialog

q-pull-to-refresh/color.description: Color name for the icon from the Quasar Color Palette

q-pull-to-refresh/bg-color.description: Color name for background of the icon container from the Quasar Color Palette

q-pull-to-refresh/icon.description: Icon to display when refreshing the content

q-pull-to-refresh/scroll-target.description: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as a custom scroll container instead of the auto detected one

q-radio/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

q-radio/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-radio/model-value.description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-radio/val.description: The actual value of the option with which model value is changed

q-radio/label.description: Label to display along the radio control (or use the default slot instead of this prop)

q-radio/left-label.description: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the checkbox

q-radio/checked-icon.description: The icon to be used when selected (instead of the default design)

q-radio/unchecked-icon.description: The icon to be used when un-selected (instead of the default design)

q-radio/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-radio/keep-color.description: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when checkbox is unticked?

q-radio/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-range/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

q-range/min.description: Minimum value of the model; Set track's minimum value

q-range/max.description: Maximum value of the model; Set track's maximum value

q-range/inner-min.description: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

q-range/inner-max.description: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

q-range/step.description: Specify step amount between valid values (> 0.0); When step equals to 0 it defines infinite granularity

q-range/snap.description: Snap on valid values, rather than sliding freely; Suggestion: use with 'step' prop

q-range/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/track-color.description: Color name for the track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/track-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the track

q-range/inner-track-color.description: Color name for the inner track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/inner-track-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the inner track

q-range/selection-color.description: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/selection-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the selection bar

q-range/label.description: Popup a label when user clicks/taps on the slider thumb and moves it

q-range/label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/label-text-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/switch-label-side.description: Switch the position of the label (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

q-range/markers.description: Display markers on the track, one for each possible value for the model or using a custom step (when specifying a Number)

q-range/marker-labels.description: Configure the marker labels (or show the default ones if 'true'); Array of definition Objects or Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label definition

q-range/marker-labels-class.description: CSS class(es) to apply to the marker labels container

q-range/switch-marker-labels-side.description: Switch the position of the marker labels (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

q-range/thumb-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-range/model-value.description: Model of the component of type { min, max } (both values must be between global min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

q-range/drag-range.description: User can drag range instead of just the two thumbs

q-range/drag-only-range.description: User can drag only the range instead and NOT the two thumbs

q-range/left-label-color.description: Color name for left label background from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/left-label-text-color.description: Color name for left label text from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/right-label-color.description: Color name for right label background from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/right-label-text-color.description: Color name for right label text from the Quasar Color Palette

q-range/left-label-value.description: Override default label for min value

q-range/right-label-value.description: Override default label for max value

q-range/left-thumb-color.description: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for left thumb

q-range/right-thumb-color.description: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for right thumb

q-rating/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

q-rating/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-rating/model-value.description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

q-rating/icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

q-rating/icon-selected.description: Icon name following Quasar convention to be used when selected (optional); make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

q-rating/icon-half.description: Icon name following Quasar convention to be used when selected (optional); make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

q-rating/icon-aria-label.description: Label to be set on aria-label for Icon; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding aria-label in the array (0 based); If string value is provided the rating value will be appended; If not provided the name of the icon will be used

q-rating/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette; v1.5.0+: If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding color in the array (0 based)

q-rating/color-selected.description: Color name from the Quasar Palette for selected icons

q-rating/color-half.description: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons

q-rating/no-dimming.description: Does not lower opacity for unselected icons

q-rating/no-reset.description: When used, disables default behavior of clicking/tapping on icon which represents current model value to reset model to 0

q-responsive/ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the content; If value is a String, then avoid using a computational statement (like '16/9') and instead specify the String value of the result directly (eg. '1.7777')

q-scroll-area/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-scroll-area/bar-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the scrollbars (both vertical and horizontal)

q-scroll-area/vertical-bar-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the vertical scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'bar-style' prop

q-scroll-area/horizontal-bar-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the horizontal scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'bar-style' prop

q-scroll-area/thumb-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the thumb of scrollbars (both vertical and horizontal)

q-scroll-area/vertical-thumb-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the thumb of the vertical scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'thumb-style' prop

q-scroll-area/horizontal-thumb-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the thumb of the horizontal scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'thumb-style' prop

q-scroll-area/content-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QScrollArea

q-scroll-area/content-active-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QScrollArea when scroll area becomes active (is mouse hovered)

q-scroll-area/visible.description: Manually control the visibility of the scrollbar; Overrides default mouse over/leave behavior

q-scroll-area/delay.description: When content changes, the scrollbar appears; this delay defines the amount of time (in milliseconds) before scrollbars disappear again (if component is not hovered)

q-scroll-observer/axis.description: Axis on which to detect changes

q-scroll-observer/scroll-target.description: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as a custom scroll container instead of the auto detected one

q-select/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms; If not specified, it takes the value of 'for' prop, if it exists

q-select/virtual-scroll-horizontal.description: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode

q-select/virtual-scroll-slice-size.description: Minimum number of items to render in the virtual list

q-select/virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-befo.description: Ratio of number of items in visible zone to render before it

q-select/virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-afte.description: Ratio of number of items in visible zone to render after it

q-select/virtual-scroll-item-size.description: Default size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of an item; This value is used for rendering the initial list; Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item

q-select/virtual-scroll-sticky-size-star.description: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the start of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision

q-select/virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.description: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the end of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision

q-select/table-colspan.description: The number of columns in the table (you need this if you use table-layout: fixed)

q-select/model-value.description: Model of the component; Must be Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

q-select/error-message.description: Validation error message (gets displayed only if 'error' is set to 'true')

q-select/no-error-icon.description: Hide error icon when there is an error

q-select/rules.description: Array of Functions/Strings; If String, then it must be a name of one of the embedded validation rules

q-select/reactive-rules.description: By default a change in the rules does not trigger a new validation until the model changes; If set to true then a change in the rules will trigger a validation; Has a performance penalty, so use it only when you really need it

q-select/lazy-rules.description: If set to boolean true then it checks validation status against the 'rules' only after field loses focus for first time; If set to 'ondemand' then it will trigger only when component's validate() method is manually called or when the wrapper QForm submits itself

q-select/label.description: A text label that will â€œfloatâ€ up above the input field, once the field gets focus

q-select/stack-label.description: Label will be always shown above the field regardless of field content (if any)

q-select/hint.description: Helper (hint) text which gets placed below your wrapped form component

q-select/hide-hint.description: Hide the helper (hint) text when field doesn't have focus

q-select/label-color.description: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused

q-select/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-select/bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-select/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-select/loading.description: Signals the user a process is in progress by displaying a spinner; Spinner can be customized by using the 'loading' slot.

q-select/clearable.description: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null

q-select/clear-icon.description: Custom icon to use for the clear button when using along with 'clearable' prop

q-select/standout.description: Use 'standout' design for the field; Specifies classes to be applied when focused (overriding default ones)

q-select/label-slot.description: Enables label slot; You need to set it to force use of the 'label' slot if the 'label' prop is not set

q-select/hide-bottom-space.description: Do not reserve space for hint/error/counter anymore when these are not used; As a result, it also disables the animation for those; It also allows the hint/error area to stretch vertically based on its content

q-select/counter.description: Show an automatic counter on bottom right

q-select/rounded.description: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component

q-select/square.description: Remove border-radius so borders are squared; Overrides 'rounded' prop

q-select/item-aligned.description: Match inner content alignment to that of QItem

q-select/autofocus.description: Focus field on initial component render

q-select/for.description: Used to specify the 'id' of the control and also the 'for' attribute of the label that wraps it; If no 'name' prop is specified, then it is used for this attribute as well

q-select/multiple.description: Allow multiple selection; Model must be Array

q-select/display-value.description: Override default selection string, if not using 'selected' slot/scoped slot and if not using 'use-chips' prop

q-select/display-value-html.description: Force render the selected option(s) as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the content; Does NOT apply when using 'selected' or 'selected-item' slots!

q-select/options.description: Available options that the user can select from. For best performance freeze the list of options.

q-select/option-value.description: Property of option which holds the 'value'; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-select/option-label.description: Property of option which holds the 'label'; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-select/option-disable.description: Property of option which tells it's disabled; The value of the property must be a Boolean; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

q-select/hide-selected.description: Hides selection; Use the underlying input tag to hold the label (instead of showing it to the right of the input) of the selected option; Only works for non 'multiple' Selects

q-select/dropdown-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

q-select/max-values.description: Allow a maximum number of selections that the user can do

q-select/options-dense.description: Dense mode for options list; occupies less space

q-select/options-dark.description: Options menu will be colored with a dark color

q-select/options-selected-class.description: CSS class name for options that are active/selected; Set it to an empty string to stop applying the default (which is text-* where * is the 'color' prop value)

q-select/options-html.description: Force render the options as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the content; Does NOT apply when using 'option' slot!

q-select/options-cover.description: Expanded menu will cover the component (will not work along with 'use-input' prop for obvious reasons)

q-select/menu-shrink.description: Allow the options list to be narrower than the field (only in menu mode)

q-select/menu-anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the options list relative to the field (only in menu mode)

q-select/menu-self.description: Two values setting the options list's own position relative to its target (only in menu mode)

q-select/menu-offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the options list horizontally and vertically in pixels (only in menu mode)

q-select/popup-content-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the popup content

q-select/popup-content-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the popup content

q-select/use-input.description: Use an input tag where users can type

q-select/use-chips.description: Use QChip to show what is currently selected

q-select/fill-input.description: Fills the input with current value; Useful along with 'hide-selected'; Does NOT works along with 'multiple' selection

q-select/new-value-mode.description: Enables creation of new values and defines behavior when a new value is added: 'add' means it adds the value (even if possible duplicate), 'add-unique' adds only unique values, and 'toggle' adds or removes the value (based on if it exists or not already); When using this prop then listening for @new-value becomes optional (only to override the behavior defined by 'new-value-mode')

q-select/map-options.description: Try to map labels of model from 'options' Array; has a small performance penalty; If you are using emit-value you will probably need to use map-options to display the label text in the select field rather than the value;  Refer to the 'Affecting model' section above

q-select/emit-value.description: Update model with the value of the selected option instead of the whole option

q-select/input-debounce.description: Debounce the input model update with an amount of milliseconds

q-select/input-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the underlying input tag

q-select/input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the underlying input tag

q-select/transition-show.description: Transition when showing the menu/dialog; One of Quasar's embedded transitions

q-select/transition-hide.description: Transition when hiding the menu/dialog; One of Quasar's embedded transitions

q-select/transition-duration.description: Transition duration when hiding the menu/dialog (in milliseconds, without unit)

q-select/behavior.description: Overrides the default dynamic mode of showing as menu on desktop and dialog on mobiles

q-separator/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-separator/spaced.description: If set to true, the corresponding direction margins will be set to 8px; It can also be set to a size in CSS units, including unit name, or one of the xs|sm|md|lg|xl predefined sizes

q-separator/inset.description: If set to Boolean true, the left and right margins will be set to 16px. If set to 'item' then it will match a QItem's design. If set to 'item-thumbnail' then it will match the design of a QItem with a thumbnail on the left side

q-separator/vertical.description: If set to true, the separator will be vertical.

q-separator/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name

q-separator/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-skeleton/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-skeleton/animation.description: The animation effect of the skeleton placeholder

q-skeleton/square.description: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

q-skeleton/bordered.description: Applies a default border to the component

q-skeleton/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name; Overrides 'height' and 'width' props and applies the value to both height and width

q-skeleton/width.description: Width in CSS units, including unit name; Apply custom width; Use this prop or through CSS; Overridden by 'size' prop if used

q-skeleton/height.description: Height in CSS units, including unit name; Apply custom height; Use this prop or through CSS; Overridden by 'size' prop if used

q-slide-item/left-color.description: Color name for left-side background from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slide-item/right-color.description: Color name for right-side background from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slide-item/top-color.description: Color name for top-side background from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slide-item/bottom-color.description: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slide-item/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-slide-transition/appear.description: If set to true, the transition will be applied on the initial render.

q-slider/name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

q-slider/min.description: Minimum value of the model; Set track's minimum value

q-slider/max.description: Maximum value of the model; Set track's maximum value

q-slider/inner-min.description: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

q-slider/inner-max.description: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

q-slider/step.description: Specify step amount between valid values (> 0.0); When step equals to 0 it defines infinite granularity

q-slider/snap.description: Snap on valid values, rather than sliding freely; Suggestion: use with 'step' prop

q-slider/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/track-color.description: Color name for the track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/track-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the track

q-slider/inner-track-color.description: Color name for the inner track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/inner-track-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the inner track

q-slider/selection-color.description: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/selection-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the selection bar

q-slider/label.description: Popup a label when user clicks/taps on the slider thumb and moves it

q-slider/label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/label-text-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/switch-label-side.description: Switch the position of the label (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

q-slider/markers.description: Display markers on the track, one for each possible value for the model or using a custom step (when specifying a Number)

q-slider/marker-labels.description: Configure the marker labels (or show the default ones if 'true'); Array of definition Objects or Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label definition

q-slider/marker-labels-class.description: CSS class(es) to apply to the marker labels container

q-slider/switch-marker-labels-side.description: Switch the position of the marker labels (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

q-slider/thumb-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-slider/dark.description: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

q-slider/model-value.description: Model of the component (must be between min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

q-spinner/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner/thickness.description: Override value to use for stroke-width

q-spinner-audio/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-audio/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-ball/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-ball/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-bars/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-bars/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-box/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-box/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-clock/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-clock/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-comment/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-comment/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-cube/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-cube/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-dots/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-dots/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-facebook/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-facebook/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-gears/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-gears/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-grid/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-grid/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-hearts/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-hearts/color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

q-spinner-hourglass/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-infinity/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-pie/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-puff/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

q-spinner-radio/size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
